events.description: Emitted when a tracking log event is emitted.

dataClasses.name: TrackingLogData
dataClasses.description: Data related to tracking events.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: event name

attributes.name: timestamp
attributes.description: timestamp of the event

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: json string representation of a dictionary with extra data (optional), e.g., >>> {"course_id": "course-v1:edX+DemoX+Demo_Course"}

attributes.name: context
attributes.description: json string representation of a dictionary of context data defined in https://docs.openedx.org/en/latest/developers/references/internal_data_formats/index.html

events.description: Fired when a course changes in Studio in a way that is relevant for catalog consumers.

dataClasses.name: CourseCatalogData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a course catalog entry.

attributes.name: course_key
attributes.description: identifier of the Course object.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: course name.

attributes.name: schedule_data
attributes.description: scheduling information for the course.

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description: whether the course is hidden from search (optional).

attributes.name: invitation_only
attributes.description: whether the course requires an invitation to enroll.

events.description: Fired when an XBlock is created.

dataClasses.name: XBlockData
dataClasses.description: Data related to an XBlock object.

attributes.name: usage_key
attributes.description: identifier of the XBlock object.

attributes.name: block_type
attributes.description: type of block.

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: identifier of the XBlock object with branch and version data (optional). This could be used to get the exact version of the XBlock object.

events.description: Fired when an XBlock is updated.

dataClasses.name: XBlockData
dataClasses.description: Data related to an XBlock object.

attributes.name: usage_key
attributes.description: identifier of the XBlock object.

attributes.name: block_type
attributes.description: type of block.

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: identifier of the XBlock object with branch and version data (optional). This could be used to get the exact version of the XBlock object.

events.description: Fired when an XBlock is published. If a parent block with changes in one or more child blocks is published, only a single XBLOCK_PUBLISHED event is fired with parent block details. For example: If a section is published with changes in multiple units, only a single event is fired with section details like : `XBlockData(usage_key="section-usage-key", block_type="chapter")`

dataClasses.name: XBlockData
dataClasses.description: Data related to an XBlock object.

attributes.name: usage_key
attributes.description: identifier of the XBlock object.

attributes.name: block_type
attributes.description: type of block.

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: identifier of the XBlock object with branch and version data (optional). This could be used to get the exact version of the XBlock object.

events.description: Fired when an XBlock is deleted.

dataClasses.name: XBlockData
dataClasses.description: Data related to an XBlock object.

attributes.name: usage_key
attributes.description: identifier of the XBlock object.

attributes.name: block_type
attributes.description: type of block.

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: identifier of the XBlock object with branch and version data (optional). This could be used to get the exact version of the XBlock object.

events.description: Fired when an XBlock is duplicated in Studio.

dataClasses.name: DuplicatedXBlockData
dataClasses.description: Data related to an XBlock object that has been duplicated.

attributes.name: source_usage_key
attributes.description: identifier of the source XBlock object.

events.description: Fired when a course certificate configuration changes in Studio. https://github.com/openedx/openedx-events/issues/445 for more information about the future of this event.

dataClasses.name: CertificateConfigData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a certificate configuration. Subset of CertificateConfig object from the LMS.

attributes.name: certificate_type
attributes.description: certificate type. Possible types are certificate relevant course modes: - credit, - verified, - professional, - no-id-professional, - executive-education, - paid-executive-education, - paid-bootcamp, - masters.

attributes.name: course_key
attributes.description: identifier of the Course object.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: certificate title.

attributes.name: signatories
attributes.description: contains a collection of signatures that belong to the certificate configuration.

attributes.name: is_active
attributes.description: indicates whether the certifivate configuration is active.

events.description: Fired when a course certificate configuration deletes in Studio. https://github.com/openedx/openedx-events/issues/445 for more information about the future of this event.

dataClasses.name: CertificateConfigData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a certificate configuration. Subset of CertificateConfig object from the LMS.

attributes.name: certificate_type
attributes.description: certificate type. Possible types are certificate relevant course modes: - credit, - verified, - professional, - no-id-professional, - executive-education, - paid-executive-education, - paid-bootcamp, - masters.

attributes.name: course_key
attributes.description: identifier of the Course object.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: certificate title.

attributes.name: signatories
attributes.description: contains a collection of signatures that belong to the certificate configuration.

attributes.name: is_active
attributes.description: indicates whether the certifivate configuration is active.

events.description: Emitted when a course is created.

dataClasses.name: CourseData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a course object.

attributes.name: course_key
attributes.description: identifier of the Course object.

events.description: Emitted when a content library is created.

dataClasses.name: ContentLibraryData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a content library that has changed.

attributes.name: library_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a v2 content library.

attributes.name: update_blocks
attributes.description: DEPRECATED flag to indicate whether the content library blocks indexes should be updated. Now we send individual events for each updated item instead.

events.description: Emitted when a content library is updated, such as its name is changed. This is NOT sent when the only changes are to items within the library, even though that affects the "last updated" and potentially "last published" or "has unpublished changes" aspects of the library overall. To detect those, subscribe to the detailed LIBRARY_* events.

dataClasses.name: ContentLibraryData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a content library that has changed.

attributes.name: library_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a v2 content library.

attributes.name: update_blocks
attributes.description: DEPRECATED flag to indicate whether the content library blocks indexes should be updated. Now we send individual events for each updated item instead.

events.description: Emitted when a content library is deleted.

dataClasses.name: ContentLibraryData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a content library that has changed.

attributes.name: library_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a v2 content library.

attributes.name: update_blocks
attributes.description: DEPRECATED flag to indicate whether the content library blocks indexes should be updated. Now we send individual events for each updated item instead.

attributes.name: library_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a v2 content library.

attributes.name: usage_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a XBlock in a Blockstore-based content library.

events.description: Emitted when a library XBlock (draft) is updated.

dataClasses.name: LibraryBlockData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a library block that has changed.

attributes.name: library_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a v2 content library.

attributes.name: usage_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a XBlock in a Blockstore-based content library.

events.description: Emitted when a library XBlock (draft) is deleted.

dataClasses.name: LibraryBlockData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a library block that has changed.

attributes.name: library_key

attributes.name: usage_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a XBlock in a Blockstore-based content library.

events.description: Emitted when a library XBlock is published. Also when a library block draft is deleted and then the deletion is published.

dataClasses.name: LibraryBlockData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a library block that has changed.

attributes.name: library_key
attributes.description: a key that represents a v2 content library.

attributes.name: usage_key

events.description: Emitted when an object's associations are changed, e.g tags, collections

dataClasses.name: ContentObjectChangedData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a content object that has changed.

attributes.name: changes
attributes.description: list of changes made to this ContentObject, e.g. "tags", "collections". If list is empty, assume everything has changed.

events.description: Emitted when an object's tags are changed.

dataClasses.name: ContentObjectData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a content object.

attributes.name: object_id
attributes.description: identifier of the Content object. This represents the id of the course or library block as a string. For example: >>> block-v1:SampleTaxonomyOrg2+STC1+2023_1+type@vertical+block@f8de78f0897049ce997777a3a31b6ea0

events.description: Emitted when a content library collection is created.

dataClasses.name: LibraryCollectionData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a library collection that has changed.

attributes.name: collection_key
attributes.description: identifies the collection within the library's learning package

attributes.name: background
attributes.description: **DEPRECATED** field. Indicated the sender doesn't want to wait for handler to finish execution. Now instead we recommend that simple handlers are synchronous and the _sender_ of the event should send the event(s) from an async celery task if it is expected to result in a lot of handlers being called.

attributes.description: **DEPRECATED** field. Indicated the sender doesn't want to wait for handler to finish execution. Now instead we recommend that simple handlers are synchronous and the _sender_ of the event should send the event(s) from an async celery task if it is expected to result in a lot of handlers being called.

events.description: Fired after a course is imported

dataClasses.name: CourseData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a course object.

attributes.name: course_key
attributes.description: identifier of the Course object.

events.description: emitted when an enterprise subsidy is utilized. https://github.com/openedx/openedx-events/issues/445 for more information about the future of this event.
emitted when an enterprise subsidy is reversed. https://github.com/openedx/openedx-events/issues/445 for more information about the future of this event.
emitted when an enterprise ledger transaction is created. See: https://github.com/openedx/openedx-ledger/tree/main/docs/decisions
emitted when an enterprise ledger transaction is committed. See: https://github.com/openedx/openedx-ledger/tree/main/docs/decisions
emitted when an enterprise ledger transaction fails. See: https://github.com/openedx/openedx-ledger/tree/main/docs/decisions
emitted when an enterprise ledger transaction is reversed. See: https://github.com/openedx/openedx-ledger/tree/main/docs/decisions
emitted when a LearnerCreditEnterpriseCourseEnrollment is revoked. This most often happens when an enterprise learner unenrolls from a course which was LC-subsidized.
Emitted when a user completes registration in Open edX.

dataClasses.name: UserData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a user object, including personal information and non-personal information.

attributes.name: pii
attributes.description: user's Personal Identifiable Information.

events.description: Emitted when a user logs in to Open edX.

dataClasses.name: UserData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a user object, including personal information and non-personal information.

attributes.name: pii
attributes.description: user's Personal Identifiable Information.

events.description: Emitted when the user enrolls in a course.

dataClasses.name: CourseEnrollmentData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a course enrollment object.

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: user associated with the Course Enrollment.

attributes.name: course
attributes.description: course where the user is enrolled in.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: course mode associated with the course enrollment.

attributes.name: is_active
attributes.description: whether the enrollment is active.

attributes.name: creation_date
attributes.description: creation date of the enrollment.

attributes.name: created_by
attributes.description: if available, who created the enrollment.

attributes.name: is_active
attributes.description: whether the enrollment is active.

attributes.name: creation_date
attributes.description: creation date of the enrollment.

attributes.name: created_by
attributes.description: if available, who created the enrollment.

events.description: Emitted when a certificate is created for a user.

dataClasses.name: CertificateData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a certificate object.

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: user associated with the Certificate.

attributes.name: course
attributes.description: course where the user obtained the certificate.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: course mode associated with the course enrollment.

attributes.name: grade
attributes.description: user's grade in this course run.

attributes.name: download_url
attributes.description: URL where the PDF version of the certificate.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: user's name.

attributes.name: current_status
attributes.description: current certificate status.

attributes.name: previous_status
attributes.description: if available, pre-event certificate status.

events.description: Emitted when a program certificate is awarded to a learner.

dataClasses.name: ProgramCertificateData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a Program Certificate object.

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: User associated with the Program Certificate.

attributes.name: program
attributes.description: Program data associated with the Program Certificate.

attributes.name: uuid
attributes.description: UUID of the UserCredential record in Credentials.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: The status of the credential (e.g. `awarded` or `revoked`).

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: A URL to the learner's credential.

attributes.name: certificate_available_date
attributes.description: Optional. A DateTime describing when a learner is allowed to view the credential.

events.description: Emitted when the configuration for a course's discussions changes in the course. like ``List[DiscussionTopicContext]`` cannot be serialized yet.

dataClasses.name: CourseDiscussionConfigurationData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a course discussion configuration object.

attributes.name: course_key
attributes.description: identifier of the course to which the discussion belongs.

attributes.name: provider_type
attributes.description: provider type from discussion settings.

attributes.name: enable_in_context
attributes.description: indicates whether in-context discussion is enabled for the course

attributes.name: enable_graded_units
attributes.description: If enabled, discussion topics will be created for graded units as well.

attributes.name: unit_level_visibility
attributes.description: visibility for unit level.

attributes.name: plugin_configuration
attributes.description: The plugin configuration data for this context/provider.

attributes.name: contexts
attributes.description: contains all the contexts for which discussion is to be enabled.

events.description: Emitted when a course's persistent grade summary changes for a user.

dataClasses.name: PersistentCourseGradeData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a persistent course grade object.

attributes.name: user_id
attributes.description: identifier of the grade to which the grade belongs.

attributes.name: course
attributes.description: Identifier of the course to which the grade belongs.

attributes.name: course_edited_timestamp
attributes.description: date the course was edited.

attributes.name: course_version
attributes.description: version of the course.

attributes.name: grading_policy_hash
attributes.description: grading policy hash of the course.

attributes.name: percent_grade
attributes.description: percentage of the grade.

attributes.name: letter_grade
attributes.description: grade in letter

attributes.name: passed_timestamp
attributes.description: date the course was passed.

events.description: Emitted when a new thread is created in a discussion. are not serializable.

dataClasses.name: DiscussionThreadData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a discussion thread object, used to represent Forum events such as comments, responses, and threads.

attributes.name: anonymous
attributes.description: indicates whether the user is anonymous.

attributes.name: anonymous_to_peers
attributes.description: indicates whether the user is anonymous to peers.

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: body of the discussion thread.

attributes.name: category_id
attributes.description: identifier of the category.

attributes.name: category_name
attributes.description: name of the category.

attributes.name: commentable_id
attributes.description: identifier of the commentable.

attributes.name: group_id
attributes.description: identifier of the group.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: identifier of the discussion thread.

attributes.name: team_id
attributes.description: identifier of the team.

attributes.name: thread_type
attributes.description: type of the thread.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: title of the thread.

attributes.name: title_truncated
attributes.description: indicates whether the title is truncated.

attributes.name: truncated
attributes.description: indicates whether the thread is truncated.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: url of the thread.

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: information of the user that authored the thread/comment/response.

attributes.name: course_id
attributes.description: identifier of the course.

attributes.name: discussion
attributes.description: discussion data. (optional, specific to comments and responses)

attributes.name: user_course_roles
attributes.description: user course roles.

attributes.name: user_forums_roles
attributes.description: user forums roles.

attributes.name: options
attributes.description: options for the thread.

attributes.name: options

events.description: Emitted when a new comment is added to a response. are not serializable.

events.description: Emitted when a notification is requested for a course. are not serializable.

dataClasses.name: CourseNotificationData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a course notification object.

attributes.name: course_key
attributes.description: identifier of the Course object.

attributes.name: app_name
attributes.description: name of the app requesting the course notification.

attributes.name: notification_type
attributes.description: type of the notification.

attributes.name: content_url
attributes.description: url of the content the notification will redirect to.

attributes.name: content_context
attributes.description: additional information related to the content of the notification. Notification content templates are defined in edx-platform here:

attributes.name: audience_filters
attributes.description: additional information related to the audience of the notification. We can have different filters on course level, such as roles, enrollments, cohorts etc.

events.description: Emitted when a user submits an ORA assignment.

dataClasses.name: ORASubmissionData
dataClasses.description: Data associated to the ORA assessment submitted by a user.

attributes.name: uuid
attributes.description: The UUID of the ORA submission.

attributes.name: anonymous_user_id
attributes.description: Optional. Anonymous user ID of the user who submitted the ORA submission.

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: Optional. Location of the ORA submission.

attributes.name: attempt_number
attributes.description: Attempt number of the ORA submission.

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when the ORA submission was created.

attributes.name: submitted_at
attributes.description: Date and time when the ORA submission was submitted.

attributes.name: answer
attributes.description: Answer submitted by the user in the ORA submission.

events.description: Emitted when course grade updates.

dataClasses.name: CoursePassingStatusData
dataClasses.description: Represents the event data when a user's grade is updated, indicates if current grade is enough for course passing.

attributes.name: is_passing
attributes.description: Indicates whether the user's grade is enough to pass the course.

attributes.name: course
attributes.description: An instance of CourseData containing details about the course in which the grade was updated.

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: An instance of UserData containing information about the user whose grade was updated.

events.description: Emitted when a CCX course grade updates.

dataClasses.name: CcxCoursePassingStatusData
dataClasses.description: Extends CoursePassingStatusData for CCX courses, specifying CCX course data.

attributes.name: course
attributes.description: An instance of CcxCourseData containing details about the CCX course in which the grade threshold was crossed.

events.description: Emit when a badge is awarded to a learner.

dataClasses.name: BadgeData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a badge object.

attributes.name: uuid
attributes.description: the UUID of the badge.

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: user associated with the badge.

attributes.name: template
attributes.description: badge template data.

events.description: Emit when a badge is revoked for a learner,

dataClasses.name: BadgeData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a badge object.

attributes.name: uuid
attributes.description: the UUID of the badge.

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: user associated with the badge.

attributes.name: template
attributes.description: badge template data.

events.description: Emitted when an IDV attempt is created.

dataClasses.name: VerificationAttemptData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a IDV attempt object.

attributes.name: attempt_id
attributes.description: the id of the verification attempt

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: the user (usually a learner) performing the verification attempt.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: the status of the verification attempt.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: the name being ID verified. Defaults to None.

events.description: Emitted when an IDV attempt is marked as pending.

dataClasses.name: VerificationAttemptData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a IDV attempt object.

attributes.name: attempt_id
attributes.description: the id of the verification attempt

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: the user (usually a learner) performing the verification attempt.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: the status of the verification attempt.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: the name being ID verified. Defaults to None.

events.description: Emitted when an IDV attempt is approved.

dataClasses.name: VerificationAttemptData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a IDV attempt object.

attributes.name: attempt_id
attributes.description: the id of the verification attempt

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: the user (usually a learner) performing the verification attempt.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: the status of the verification attempt.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: the name being ID verified. Defaults to None.

events.description: Emitted when an IDV attempt is denied.

dataClasses.name: VerificationAttemptData
dataClasses.description: Data related to a IDV attempt object.

attributes.name: attempt_id
attributes.description: the id of the verification attempt

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: the user (usually a learner) performing the verification attempt.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: the status of the verification attempt.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: the name being ID verified. Defaults to None.

events.description: emitted when an external grader provides a score for a submission

dataClasses.name: ExternalGraderScoreData
dataClasses.description: Class that encapsulates score data provided by an external grader.

attributes.name: points_possible
attributes.description: Maximum possible score for this assignment

attributes.name: points_earned
attributes.description: Score earned by the student

attributes.name: course_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the course

attributes.name: score_msg
attributes.description: Descriptive message about the score (feedback)

attributes.name: submission_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the graded submission

attributes.name: user_id
attributes.description: ID of the user who submitted the assignment

attributes.name: module_id
attributes.description: ID of the module/problem being graded

attributes.name: queue_key
attributes.description: Unique key for the submission in the queue

attributes.name: queue_name
attributes.description: Name of the queue that processed the submission
